flawed_nl_solution:
The number of truck stamps is 11 + 9 = <<11+9=25>>25.
The number of rose stamps is 25 − 13 = <<25-13=12>>12.
Bella bought 11 + 25 + 12 = <<11+25+12=48>>48 stamps in all.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 25. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
